hanzi-su-wiki:
損

Значения

Ущерб, вред; повреждать; быть поврежденным; портить

Мнемоника

Чиновник 員, нечистый на руку 扌 расхититель.

Варианты

损
purpleculture_pinyin:
sǔn
to decrease; to lose; to damage; to harm; (coll.) to speak sarcastically; to deride; caustic; mean; one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)
чтобы уменьшить; терять; повреждать; повредить; (колл.) говорить саркастически; высмеивать; едкий; иметь в виду; одна из 64 гексаграмм Книги Перемен (䷨)
rtega_mnemonic:
損損RS
损损		diminish, impair, injure, damage, loss
  • hand 扌 of personnel 員 lets something fall to the ground damaged

(Simplified: 损)
Antonyms: 增
Pictophonetic: 員 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.

heisig_chinese_memo: Boss yells, "Who damaged the Xerox machine?!" fingers of employees point at one another.
heisig_constituent: damage, finger, fingers, employee, mouth, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: Boss yells, "Who damaged the Xerox machine?!" fingers of employees point at one another.
koohiiStory2: If you finger your employee, you risk incurring many damages from a possible sexual harassment lawsuit.
kunYomi: そこ.なう、そこな.う、-そこ.なう、そこ.ねる、-そこ.ねる
jp_example_words:
損なう(そこなう): to harm, to hurt, to injure, to damage, to fail in doing
損失(そんしつ): loss
破損(はそん): damage
損(そん): loss, disadvantage
損害(そんがい): damage, injury, loss
損得(そんとく): loss and gain, advantage and disadvantage
jp_readingExamples: 損なう (そこ.なう), 損ねる (そこ.ねる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Raise your fingers to another member and you'll receive a loss in return. You should never hurt a member of your team, group, or society. It's just wrong. And you'll incur a loss as punishment for your bad deeds.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine raising your fingers to slap, hurt, or point angrily at a member of your own team. How dare you! I hope you're ready for some deep, personal loss.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Unfortunately for you, payment is in the form of the loss of your son (そん). The loss of any family member is horrible, but this was your son. He was your favorite child. You loved him. But that's the loss you must bear for raising your fingers to a team member.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture your son. Your future son, maybe even your animal son, if you don't want to have real kids. Now imagine the loss of that son. Nooooo!
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 口 (рот), 扎, 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese:
sǔn: (графема) терять; причинять вред; портить, повреждать
sǔn: (глаг/прил) (диал.) высмеивать, насмехаться над; саркастический, язвительный, ехидный
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the employee's (員) hand (扌) is injured
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Employee fingers often damage the products of whatever company they work for.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand " to " member " sound. The original meaning is to reduce. "Said Wen": "Loss, less. From the hand, the member's voice." Such as "Laozi. Chapter Seventy-seven: "The way of the heavens damages more and makes up for the insufficiency; the way of man is not so, the damage is not enough to give more." "Mozi. "Seven Sufferings": "During the age, the official and the doctor will lose one-fifth of the salary."

" Damage " also means injury or damage. "tube. Interpretation of the situation": "If you are not living from time to time, eating irregularly, and uncomfortable with cold and heat, your body will become tired and life will be lost." "Ai Gong": "Therefore, wealth is not enough to benefit, and humbleness is not enough to damage. In this way, it can be called a scholar."

" Loss " means loss, loss. Such as "Book of Shang Jun. Caution: "The ruler will not observe, and war will damage his generals, and defense will sell his city." Chapter 82 of the "Water Margin": "If the Taiwei came to do this early, the country would not be taught , Wasted money and food."

Modern Chinese " damage " also means mean. For example, Zhu Ziqing's "On Nothing to Say": "The French proverb "Nothing to Say" actually agrees with "Everything is okay." Oh, what a detrimental sentence, for me and for my age!" The verb, "to hurt others" means to sarcasm others with words.
humanum_short_description_en: From " hand " to " member " sound. The original meaning is to reduce.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「員」聲。本義是減少。《說文》：「損，減也。从手，員聲。」如《老子．第七十七章》：「天之道，損有餘而補不足；人之道則不然，損不足以奉有餘。」《墨子．七患》：「歲饉，則仕者大夫以下皆損祿五分之一。」

　　「損」也表示傷害、損害。《管子．形勢解》：「起居不時，飲食不節，寒暑不適，則形體累而壽命損。」《荀子．哀公》：「故富貴不足以益也，卑賤不足以損也，如此，則可謂士也。」

　　「損」表示喪失、損失。如《商君書．慎法》：「君人者不察也，以戰必損其將，以守必賣其城。」《水滸全傳》第82回：「若得太尉早來如此，也不教國家損兵折將，虛耗了錢糧。」

　　現代漢語「損」還表示刻薄。如朱自清〈論無話可說〉：「法國俗語『無話可說』竟與『一切皆好』同意。嗚呼，這是多麼損的一句話，對於我，對於我的時代！」亦用作動詞，「損人」表示以言語挖苦別人。

損損RS

  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 員 [ yuán ] employee; member; personnel, staff
①減少：損失。損耗。損益。增損。虧損。損兵折將。
②使失去原來的使用效能：損壞。破損。易損。
③使蒙受害處：損害。滿招損，謙受益。
④用刻薄的話挖苦人：損人。
⑤刻薄，毒辣：這話太損了。
⑥益增。

從「 手 」，「 員 」聲。本義是減少。《說文》：「損，減也。从手，員聲。」如《老子．第七十七章》：「天之道，損有餘而補不足；人之道則不然，損不足以奉有餘。」《墨子．七患》：「歲饉，則仕者大夫以下皆損祿五分之一。」 「 損 」也表示傷害、損害。《管子．形勢解》：「起居不時，飲食不節，寒暑不適，則形體累而壽命損。」《荀子．哀公》：「故富貴不足以益也，卑賤不足以損也，如此，則可謂士也。」 「 損 」表示喪失、損失。如《商君書．慎法》：「君人者不察也，以戰必損其將，以守必賣其城。」《水滸全傳》第82回：「若得太尉早來如此，也不教國家損兵折將，虛耗了錢糧。」 現代漢語「 損 」還表示刻薄。如朱自清〈論無話可說〉：「法國俗語『無話可說』竟與『一切皆好』同意。嗚呼，這是多麼損的一句話，對於我，對於我的時代！」亦用作動詞，「損人」表示以言語挖苦別人。
From " hand" to " member" sound. The original meaning is to reduce. "Said Wen": "Loss, less. From the hand, the member's voice." Such as "Laozi. Chapter Seventy-seven: "The way of the heavens damages more and makes up for the insufficiency; the way of man is not so, the damage is not enough to give more." "Mozi. "Seven Sufferings": "During the age, the official and the doctor will lose one-fifth of the salary." " Damage" also means injury or damage. "tube. Interpretation of the situation": "If you are not living from time to time, eating irregularly, and uncomfortable with cold and heat, your body will become tired and life will be lost." "Ai Gong": "Therefore, wealth is not enough to benefit, and humbleness is not enough to damage. In this way, it can be called a scholar." " Loss" means loss, loss. Such as "Book of Shang Jun. Caution: "The ruler will not observe, and war will damage his generals, and defense will sell his city." Chapter 82 of the "Water Margin": "If the Taiwei came to do this early, the country would not be taught , Wasted money and food." Modern Chinese " damage" also means mean. For example, Zhu Ziqing's "On Nothing to Say": "The French proverb "Nothing to Say" actually agrees with "Everything is okay." Oh, what a detrimental sentence, for me and for my age!" The verb, "to hurt others" means to sarcasm others with words.

Name meaning

sǔn
вм. 损
Radicals: 扌, 員  (fingers, member)
Meaning Mnemonic
Raise your fingers to another member and you'll receive a loss in return. You should never hurt a member of your team, group, or society. It's just wrong. And you'll incur a loss as punishment for your bad deeds.
Imagine raising your fingers to slap, hurt, or point angrily at a member of your own team. How dare you! I hope you're ready for some deep, personal loss.
Reading Mnemonic
Unfortunately for you, payment is in the form of the loss of your son (そん). The loss of any family member is horrible, but this was your son. He was your favorite child. You loved him. But that's the loss you must bear for raising your fingers to a team member.
Picture your son. Your future son, maybe even your animal son, if you don't want to have real kids. Now imagine the loss of that son. Nooooo!
